quest.name: U! Ow! That Stings
journal: U'odh Nunh has received ill tidings.

Three U tribeswomen have been ambushed and taken captive by the Amalj'aa. U'odh Nunh tasks you with delivering ointment to the fallen, that they might be granted the dignity of fighting for their own lives.
You have eased the wounds of the captive U tribeswomen. Return and inform U'odh Nunh of your success.
His tribe whole once more, U'odh Nunh is overjoyed, and declares you a true friend to the U.
objectives: Use the battle ointment on the U tribeswomen.

dialogue.name: UODHNUN
dialogue.text: Outsider... I told you to─hm? You would help the U? You outsiders puzzle me...but I would be fool to refuse your aid.

dialogue.name: UODHNUN
dialogue.text: I am told that some of my tribeswomen have been ambushed and captured by the lizardmen. If the rumors are true, they bear grave wounds.

dialogue.name: UODHNUN
dialogue.text: The U are no strangers to death─but to die without a fair fight? That is no way for an U to die.

dialogue.name: UODHNUN
dialogue.text: I ask you not to rescue them─if they are truly U, their pride will not allow it. Ease their wounds with this salve, and they will take care of themselves.

dialogue.name: UZOKUA
dialogue.text: Watch yourself, strangerrr... Wounded or not, my claws are still sharp.

dialogue.name: UZOKUA
dialogue.text: I know not why you help me, but I thank you.

dialogue.name: UZOKUB
dialogue.text: Thank you, stranger. By your kindness, I live to fight another day.

dialogue.name: UZOKUC
dialogue.text: Gah! I'd die sooner than admit defeat to the lizardmen!

dialogue.name: UZOKUC
dialogue.text: Thank you, frrriend. I'll not forget this debt.

dialogue.name: UODHNUN
dialogue.text: The missing three have returned, and return with lizardman heads. You are a true friend to the U, outsider.
